sourcesContent:
import { Typography, Grid } from "@mui/material";
import { useFormContext } from "react-hook-form";
import AppTextInput from "../../app/components/AppTextInput";
import AppCheckBox from "../../app/components/AppCheckBox";

export default function AddressForm() {

    // const {control}=useForm();
        const {control,formState}=useFormContext();  // نستخدمها طالما ان الفورم موجود داخل فورم بروفايدر داخل صفحة الدفع

    return (
        <>
            <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                Shipping address
            </Typography>
            <Grid container spacing={3}>
                <Grid item xs={12} >
                    <AppTextInput control={control} name="fullName" label="Full Name" />
                </Grid>
                
                <Grid item xs={12}>
                <AppTextInput control={control} name="address1" label="Address 1" />

                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12}>
                <AppTextInput control={control} name="address2"  label="Address 2"  />

                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                <AppTextInput control={control} name="city" label="City" />

                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                <AppTextInput control={control} name="country" label="Country" />

                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                <AppTextInput control={control} name="postalCode" label="Postal Code" />

                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6}>
                <AppTextInput control={control}  name="phone" label="Phone" />

                </Grid>

                <Grid item xs={12}>
                   <AppCheckBox 
                   disabled={!formState.isDirty}
                   name="saveAddress" label="Save this as the default address"
                   control={control}
                   />
                </Grid>
            </Grid>
        </>
    );
}
